Package org.blockchainnative.util

Class SerializationUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.blockchainnative.util.SerializationUtil
  • public final class SerializationUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides static utility methods for extracting serializing java native types to JSON.

    The class is not intended to be instantiated as it only provides static methods.
    Since:
    1.0

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static java.lang.String buildFieldDescription​(java.lang.reflect.Field field)
      Serializes an Field to String.

      Serializes an Executable to String.
      static java.lang.String buildParameterDescription​(java.lang.reflect.Parameter parameter)
      Serializes a Parameter to String.
      static java.lang.Class<?> parseClass​(java.lang.String className)
      Tries to retrieve a class object from its name.
      static java.lang.reflect.Field parseFieldDescription​(java.lang.String fieldDescription)
      Deserializes a Field from its String representation built by buildFieldDescription(Field).
      static java.lang.reflect.Method parseMethodDescription​(java.lang.String methodDescription)
      Deserializes a Method from its String representation built by buildMethodDescription(Executable).

    • Method Detail

      • parseClass

        public static java.lang.Class<?> parseClass​(java.lang.String className)
        Tries to retrieve a class object from its name.
        Parameters:
        className - name of the class
        Returns:
        the class object representing the given className.
        Throws:
        SerializationException - if no class with the given name is found

      • buildParameterDescription

        public static java.lang.String buildParameterDescription​(java.lang.reflect.Parameter parameter)
        Serializes a Parameter to String.

        The resulting String is of the format <class name>.<method name>(<parameter type>, ...)[parameter index]
        Parameters:
        parameter - Parameter to be serialized
        Returns:
        String representation of the given Parameter.
        See Also:
        buildMethodDescription(Executable)

      • parseParameterDescription

        public static java.lang.reflect.Parameter parseParameterDescription​(java.lang.String parameterDescription)
        Deserializes a Parameter from its String representation built by buildParameterDescription(Parameter).
        Parameters:
        parameterDescription - String representation of the Parameter
        Returns:
        Parameter object represented by the given String
        Throws:
        SerializationException - in case the parameterDescription is invalid with respect to buildParameterDescription(Parameter)
        See Also:
        buildParameterDescription(Parameter)

      • buildMethodDescription

        public static java.lang.String buildMethodDescription​(java.lang.reflect.Executable executable)
        Serializes an Executable to String.

        The resulting String is of the format <class name>.<executable name>(<parameter type>, ...)
        Parameters:
        executable - Executable to be serialized
        Returns:
        String representation of the given Executable.

      • parseMethodDescription

        public static java.lang.reflect.Method parseMethodDescription​(java.lang.String methodDescription)
        Deserializes a Method from its String representation built by buildMethodDescription(Executable).
        Parameters:
        methodDescription - String representation of the Method
        Returns:
        Method object represented by the given String
        Throws:
        SerializationException - in case the methodDescription is invalid with respect to buildMethodDescription(Executable)
        See Also:
        buildMethodDescription(Executable)

      • buildFieldDescription

        public static java.lang.String buildFieldDescription​(java.lang.reflect.Field field)
        Serializes an Field to String.

        The resulting String is of the format <class name>.<field name>
        Parameters:
        field - Field to be serialized
        Returns:
        String representation of the given Field.

      • parseFieldDescription

        public static java.lang.reflect.Field parseFieldDescription​(java.lang.String fieldDescription)
        Deserializes a Field from its String representation built by buildFieldDescription(Field).
        Parameters:
        fieldDescription - String representation of the Field
        Returns:
        Field object represented by the given String
        Throws:
        SerializationException - in case the fieldDescription is invalid with respect to buildFieldDescription(Field)
        See Also:
        buildFieldDescription(Field)
